title: bounty786
author: bounty786
content: We have Entered the Bear Market Now.Time to Start Buying, but not all at once, partial buys.  BTC dominance rising, some altcoins returning to the same level as 2020, and BTC falling further will crash some more altcoins.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Quote from: bounty786 on July 14, 2022, 12:07:09 PMWe have Entered the Bear Market Now.Time to Start Buying, but not all at once, partial buys.  BTC dominance rising, some altcoins returning to the same level as 2020, and BTC falling further will crash some more altcoins.I think you are rather too late to notice the arrival of the bear market which has already started since last year only in a gradual process, at this point I would say we are well into the bear market season. You are right, this is the time to build a healthy portfolio for the next bull market, partial buys is always the best approach because the market keeps dropping and you can always dca every time it goes lower. Let's assume most of us are taking advantage the bear season in the way we can afford. I look forward to another bull season.

comments.author: DigitalCurrencyConsultant
comments.body: It may just be a good time to start acquiring alts and drops again and build up one's stash. But this is the crypto market, you never know what is in store.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: I have been trying to accumulate more tokens in my wallet. So many tokens were going back to the yearly low or even deeper. It's a bit too late to accumulate as the market is slowly recovering again even so many traders didn't even care anymore with tesla who has sold 75% of its bitcoin. I guess if the dump was also getting triggered caused by the big sell by tesla as well. There's also statement if that company will buy bitcoin again soon. This bearish market may going for so long. Anyone already prepared their money to bought more tokens at the bottom price. It seems like that market was showing a recovery signal.

comments.author: Stella Mese
comments.created_time: August 02, 2022, 07:08:39 AMLast edit: August 02, 2022, 07:19:55 AM by Stella Mese
comments.body: with a bear market means there is a good opportunity to invest in crypto and be able to buy at low prices. I have also now started buying crypto, because I don't want to miss this great opportunity not to buy crypto. so I will buy crypto because this is a good time to buy crypto and eventually there will be a bull market. and we will get the maximum profit

comments.author: traderethereum
comments.body: Quote from: bounty786 on July 14, 2022, 12:07:09 PMWe have Entered the Bear Market Now.Time to Start Buying, but not all at once, partial buys.  BTC dominance rising, some altcoins returning to the same level as 2020, and BTC falling further will crash some more altcoins.But hopefully, altcoins don't crash if bitcoin declines again because it could be an opportunity for altcoins to rise again.But the current bitcoin price has returned to the $22k level and has made many altcoin prices also go down, even though some altcoins have not experienced a sharp decline.But we must still be prepared if the bear market does come back because it could cause the crypto market to experience a deep crash.The important thing is that we can prepare some money to buy bitcoin at a low price and maybe it is a good time to buy it this year.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: It is noticeable that many of the altcoins have really gone down again after the push and bear market that we went through.That's typically the market that we're used to see and that's why if you're someone that still keep on collecting on random altcoins, you'll start to think if it's worth it.And also, if you've seen that your portfolio has grown a lot but you never sold any of them. You are for sure have been regretting that you've became greedy and never took the time to sell for your profit.

comments.author: makishart
comments.body: Im still wanna know how long this bearish market will be happening. I have been buying some tokens but it seems like that the bearish trend was still dominating the market. It seems like bitcoin is slowly recovering again from the bottom. So many new speculators are appearing right now and creating bunch of various prediction based on technical analysis but most of these predictions were fail.

comments.author: peter0425
comments.body: Quote from: bounty786 on July 14, 2022, 12:07:09 PMWe have Entered the Bear Market Now.Time to Start Buying, but not all at once, partial buys.  BTC dominance rising, some altcoins returning to the same level as 2020, and BTC falling further will crash some more altcoins.I am putting 5% of my Monthly Income to invest in Bitcoin and the other 5% is for altcoin that I will choose.this is the strategy i am doing now because I have limited income as an effect of pandemic still , and also all my bounty profits remains in my holding and none will be taken away even in emergency purposes lol.and this is what we need now , to put our small money inside dumping prices.

comments.author: inanilujimi
comments.body: In this market the slightest increase in bitcoin means a lot to almost all altcoins, but sadly the increase didn't last more than 3 days and after that it decreased slowly over a week.whatever the shape of the market I will stay here to continue to enjoy the process that is happening in the market.

comments.author: dbundus
comments.body: Quote from: bounty786 on July 14, 2022, 12:07:09 PMWe have Entered the Bear Market Now.Time to Start Buying, but not all at once, partial buys.  BTC dominance rising, some altcoins returning to the same level as 2020, and BTC falling further will crash some more altcoins.No one except the insiders know what season we're in. The only thing people know is about recession, but how that will play out in the market isn't certain to anyone. Overall, I am very bullish about the rest of the year.

comments.author: JoyMarsha
comments.body: The partial buy you mean is it to invest in what you can afford to lose or something else? Elaborate on what you mean by partial buy.All altcoin falls with bitcoin without hesitation. The bear market we are observing today didn't start now. It has lasted for months already and nobody knows when it will end. For the investors, the bear market does serve as an opportunity for them to fill up their portfolios with bitcoin or any other potential coin. Not the time to count losses, but rather the time to buy more bitcoin or altcoin

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: Quote from: JoyMarsha on August 09, 2022, 10:06:30 PMThe partial buy you mean is it to invest in what you can afford to lose or something else? Elaborate on what you mean by partial buy.Partial buy means an effort to buy your crypto in the various level of price to avoid getting trapped into the same price level due to the bearish trend. People are using this as a strategy to decrease their chance to get a lose from buying crypto. it's caused by sometime you didn't even know how deeper the coin will be going. That will be giving you a lot of confusion to pick which level that can be considered as the best level to buy in. Quote from: JoyMarsha on August 09, 2022, 10:06:30 PMAll altcoin falls with bitcoin without hesitation. The bear market we are observing today didn't start now. It has lasted for months already and nobody knows when it will end. For the investors, the bear market does serve as an opportunity for them to fill up their portfolios with bitcoin or any other potential coin. Not the time to count losses, but rather the time to buy more bitcoin or altcoinIt may go for yearly basis. You must use old pattern of crypto as a way to identify how long the bearish market will still remain in the market. No body knows but anyone is not anticipating the pump that can happen anytime with it. Sometime it can also become your lose since you didn't know how deep the price of token will be going on. Can you predict this?

comments.author: RikandMorty1
comments.body: Wow You're only 435-days late OP, were you living under a rock these past months ? Bitcoin has reached and tested the bottom of 17k twice and it's now being traded at 40% higher then the ATL, i wouldn't exactly rush to call this the end of the bear market but the darkest days are certainly (hopefully) behind us now.

comments.author: Uruhara
comments.body: This bear market opens up opportunities for people who want to start investing in crypto. I also became more daring to invest in this bear market. for getting some coins for cheap. although the fear is still there. i.e. I am afraid this bear market will continue. but hope cures my fear. that is because we have an expectation that a bull market will definitely come after a bear market. so I will make regular purchases in this bear market and hope to make a profit when the bullrun market returns.

comments.author: MetaMii
comments.body: Quote from: RikandMorty1 on August 10, 2022, 11:47:03 PMWow You're only 435-days late OP, were you living under a rock these past months ? Bitcoin has reached and tested the bottom of 17k twice and it's now being traded at 40% higher then the ATL, i wouldn't exactly rush to call this the end of the bear market but the darkest days are certainly (hopefully) behind us now.For your mind only, we can still taste that 17k region again because I heard a big exchange is about to release some BTC to the rightful owners, they might just decide to sell off.

comments.author: asriloni
comments.body: Quote from: MetaMii on August 13, 2022, 09:02:24 AMQuote from: RikandMorty1 on August 10, 2022, 11:47:03 PMWow You're only 435-days late OP, were you living under a rock these past months ? Bitcoin has reached and tested the bottom of 17k twice and it's now being traded at 40% higher then the ATL, i wouldn't exactly rush to call this the end of the bear market but the darkest days are certainly (hopefully) behind us now.For your mind only, we can still taste that 17k region again because I heard a big exchange is about to release some BTC to the rightful owners, they might just decide to sell off.some may decide to sell of but the rest may not do that as well. Those bitcoin will be sent to the creditors of MTgox as their reimbursement from the case that happened with mtgox. I hope that bitcoin will not taste below than 20k again or it may be a disaster for bitcoin and all of us. As a trader it will give me a good opportunity to buy at the bottom but remember that needs years for crypto to recover and i didn't wanna see that happen.

comments.author: Jeger.Kiting
comments.body: It's true that right now a bear market is engulfing all cryptocurrencies, and it's a great time to pick some ALTs that you think will be great in the future and then buy them with what you've chosen. I'm sure it won't be long before the bear market will end in some time and the market will return to normal as usual. So use this very good moment for you to buy some ALT that you will choose.

comments.author: GxSTxV
comments.body: It's been a long time ago since the bear market started, don’t you remember the price of bitcoin and etherum a year ago, most strong and popular coins crashed to half of their higher price, and with that a lot of tokens disappeared or crashed badly. For me i won’t buy yet till i see a nice recovery from BTC which gonna influence the rest of the market. We still on bearish market and nobody knows for how long, but so sure there will be a good and strong bullish coming sooner or later

comments.author: bitterguy28
comments.body: Quote from: bounty786 on July 14, 2022, 12:07:09 PMWe have Entered the Bear Market Now.Time to Start Buying, but not all at once, partial buys.  BTC dominance rising, some altcoins returning to the same level as 2020, and BTC falling further will crash some more altcoins.Well the whole year seems to be a Bear market and yes this is going to climb back once again but not this time and not this year alone  lol.I made a partial buy and still buying when the price stays lowering.though i may consider buying or selling when the value change hands .Quote from: GxSTxV on August 18, 2022, 10:33:46 AMIt's been a long time ago since the bear market started, don’t you remember the price of bitcoin and etherum a year ago, most strong and popular coins crashed to half of their higher price, and with that a lot of tokens disappeared or crashed badly. For me i won’t buy yet till i see a nice recovery from BTC which gonna influence the rest of the market. We still on bearish market and nobody knows for how long, but so sure there will be a good and strong bullish coming sooner or laterso let them happen and let us do it holding , buy bitcoin when there is a chance and sell when the price increases .
